description: A BuildingConstructiveElement is an element of a Building which is essential from a structural point of view. Examples are walls, slabs, staircases, beams.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the BuildingConstructiveElement.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the BuildingConstructiveElement.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the BuildingConstructiveElement.
